issue.title: [CF 476] Announce Cooldown Time Left
issue.body:
Hi,

I would like to suggest a feature wherein you can right-click on selected cooldowns and it will announce your cooldown time remaining to the raid/ party/ say.

For example:

1. I enable it for my Rebirth cooldown on Tellmewhen for raid chat.
2. Rebirth is used.
3. In a later attempt, someone dies and they call for a brez.
4. I right-click Rebirth's Tellmewhen button and it says "Time on rebirth: 2m".


> Posted by CurseForge user Aisenfaire | Imported from CurseForge issue #476 | Raw

comments.body:
Added support for this in r502:

  • Added On Left Click and On Right Click event handlers to icons.

Just add an event handler in the Events tab that will output the desired text.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
